name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Christmas Glow: Snowfall and a Lighted Home in the Night Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy a peaceful Christmas night with snowfall and a glowing home in this live wallpaper featuring sleek design and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: A serene Christmas night with gentle snowfall and a cozy, glowing home.
Minimalist Design: A clean, festive interface for seamless browsing.
